text:
[Verse]
Golden sky fading slow
Whispering winds start to blow
City lights starting to glow
Time to let the worries go

[Verse 2]
Shadows dance on the street
Footsteps quick to the beat
Evening sings something sweet
Feel the calm in retreat

[Chorus]
Sunset whispers to the night
Tell me things will be alright
Colors blend and take their flight
Hold on tight to the fading light

[Verse 3]
Stars begin to appear
Nighttime sky crystal clear
Leave behind all the fear
In this moment we are near

[Bridge]
Moonlight paints silver streams
Chasing after quiet dreams
In the night’s gentle beams
Life is more than it seems

[Chorus]
Sunset whispers to the night
Tell me things will be alright
Colors blend and take their flight
Hold on tight to the fading light
title: Sunset Whispers
